title: Gisele Bundchen, 39, shares a photo of her mother Vania, 71, next to an image of herself:
text:
Gisele Bundchen, 39, shared a snap of her mother Vania Nonnenmacher, 71, next to an image of herself on Instagram.

Both women were in their twenties at the time.

'Mom and I when we were young. Do you think we look alike?' the wife of Tom Brady captioned the snap along with a heart and the hashtag Throwback Thursday.

Who's who?: Gisele Bundchen posted this split shot of herself and her mom at roughly the same age, captioned, ''Do you think we look alike?' with the Throwback Thursday hashtag

And they are, indeed, so much alike it's hard to tell which one is which.

Both are pictured with their long, wavy, brunette tresses streaming over their shoulders.

Vania, who is of German descent, is on the left side of the split snap.

The Vogue cover girl and her five sisters, twin Patricia, Raquel, Graziela, Gabriela and Rafaela, were raised in Rio Grande do Sul, Southern Brazil.

Gisele went on to build a career as a world-famous supermodel, moving to the U.S.

Loving daughter: Gisele hugged her mom in this gorgeous Instagram snap she shared on Vania's 71st birthday in August

Gisele began dating New England Patriots quarterback Brady in December 2006 after they were set up on a blind date by a mutual friend.

They tied the knot in February 2009 at St. Monica Catholic Church in Santa Monica and followed that in April with a second marriage ceremony in Costa Rica.

The happy couple now share Vivian, seven, and Benjamin, nine.

Tom also has 12-year-old Jack with his ex-wife, actress Bridget Moynahan.
description: The supermodel, 39, who hails from Brazil, showed where she got her beauty in two Instagram snaps comparing her mom and herself at the same age looking almost identical, on Throwback Thursday.
